summary: Transform AgileAiAgents from human-speed (week-based) to AI-speed (story-point-based) sprint system. Sprints complete when story points are delivered, not when calendar time expires.

- Estimation accuracy (committed vs delivered)
- Sprint completion predictability
- Blocker resolution speed

Process Health.content_preview:

Risk: Velocity Unknown.content_preview: **Mitigation**: Start conservative, measure actuals, adjust quickly

Risk: Over-commitment.content_preview: **Mitigation**: Buffer first sprints, use yesterday's weather

Risk: Continuous Work Burnout.content_preview: **Mitigation**: Automatic breaks between sprints, sustainable pace

Risk: Lost Human Context.content_preview: **Mitigation**: Keep complexity points, not time estimates
